question_text: Which of the following are essential to securely configuring a virtual machine? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Enable and configure a software firewall within the VM
Harden the operating system as if it's running on physical hardware
Rely on the hypervisor to filter malware automatically
Install anti-malware software in the VM
correct_answer: Enable and configure a software firewall within the VM
Harden the operating system as if it's running on physical hardware
Install anti-malware software in the VM
explanation: VMs must be individually secured using traditional security methods â€” just like physical machines.
